name: multi-db
description: //criando imagem postgress no docker docker run \ --name postgres \ -e POSTGRES_USER=hernani \ -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=nani2020 \ -e POSTGRES_DB=heroes \ -p 5432:5432 \ -d\ postgres //comando entrar no container docker exec -it postgres /bin/bash //abrir acesso administratvo docker run \ --name adminer \ -p 8080:8080 --link postgres:postgres \ -d\ adminer
